ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Bard% was (Patch message)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yep. I ve acknowledged this shortly after your first message. :-) ... Sounds great. I hope we can kabong further discussion about the crappy bards and
ygData.messageBody:
At 02:32 PM 2/27/01 -0500, Adam Wasserman wrote:
>okies, For the second time, Solon's Charismatic Concord is a +cha buff, not
>a faction song.

Yep. I've acknowledged this shortly after your first message. :-)

>About my earlier comment, perhaps I was a bit harsh. I tend to exagerate
>when I argue. I apologize for offending anyone and I don't mean to come off
>as saying my opinion is the only valid one. Perhaps I need to refine my
>opinion to what I actually mean, which is... this song has no place being
>sung during combat.
>
><snip>
>Anyways, I apologize for my comments which were off base and unnecessarily
>harsh.
>
>Draelon

Sounds great. I hope we can kabong further discussion about the "crappy"
bards and move along to something productive . . . er, like discussing how
great our Lucid Lullaby is!!

Windleaf ducks the many instruments thrown his way. :-P

---Windleaf
